Daily French Vocab: Your Simple Path to French Mastery
Boost your French vocabulary with ease! This streamlined Chrome extension delivers:

10 new French-to-English word translations daily
Clean, distraction-free interface
Automatic updates - no effort required

Expand your French knowledge effortlessly as you browse. Perfect for beginners and intermediate learners looking for consistent, bite-sized language practice.
